org.apache.james.mailbox.store.mail.model

Interface Message<Id>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Message<Id>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJPAMessage, AbstractMessage, HBaseMessage, JCRMessage, JPAEncryptedMessage, JPAMessage, JPAStreamingMessage, MaildirMessage, SimpleMessage

    public interface Message<Id>
extends Comparable<Message<Id>>
    A MIME message, consisting of meta-data (including MIME headers) plus body content. In the case of multipart documents, this body content has internal structure described by the meta-data.

      • setUid

        void setUid(long uid)
        Set the uid for the message. This must be called before the message is added to the store and must be unique / sequential.
        Parameters:
        uid -

      • setModSeq

        void setModSeq(long modSeq)
        Set the mod-sequence for the message. This must be called before the message is added to the store or any flags are changed. This must be unique / sequential.
        Parameters:
        modSeq -

      • getBodyContent

        InputStream getBodyContent()
                           throws IOException
        Gets the body content of the document. Headers are excluded. Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call, which basicly means it need to start at position 0
        Returns:
        body, not null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getMediaType

        String getMediaType()
        Gets the top level MIME content media type.
        Returns:
        top level MIME content media type, or null if default

        String getSubType()
        Gets the MIME content subtype.
        Returns:
        the MIME content subtype, or null if default

        The number of octets contained in the body of this document.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getTextualLineCount

        Long getTextualLineCount()
        Gets the number of CRLF in a textual document.
        Returns:
        CRLF count when document is textual, null otherwise

      • getHeaderContent

        InputStream getHeaderContent()
                             throws IOException
        Gets the header as InputStream. This MUST INCLUDE the CRLF terminator Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call
        Returns:
        header
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFullContent

        InputStream getFullContent()
                           throws IOException
        Returns the full raw content of the Message via an InputStream. Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call
        Returns:
        content
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getProperties

        List<Property> getProperties()
        Gets a read-only list of meta-data properties. For properties with multiple values, this list will contain several enteries with the same namespace and local name.
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of meta-data, not null
